data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a math (floating point arithmetic) module that uses the
    MPFR library (which, itself, utilises the GMP library). Seems pretty
    straightforward that the name of the module should therefore be
    Math::MPFR. A small percentage of the Math::MPFR functions can take
    Math::GMP objects as arguments.
